rqmlativ 0.0.9
  • Reference

Get a StudentGradeBucket

Source: R/Grading.R
getStudentGradeBucket.Rd

This function returns a dataframe or json object of a StudentGradeBucket

getStudentGradeBucket(
  StudentGradeBucketID,
  GradingPeriodGradeBucketID = F,
  StudentSectionID = F,
  GradeMarkID = F,
  GradeMarkIDOverride = F,
  EntityID = F,
  SchoolYearID = F,
  GradeMarkOverrideComment = F,
  CompleteByTeacher = F,
  EarnedCredits = F,
  EarnedCreditsPossible = F,
  SectionID = F,
  ConfigEarnedCredits = F,
  FailedCredits = F,
  ConfigFailedCredits = F,
  EarnedCreditAttempted = F,
  Percent = F,
  EarnedPoints = F,
  PossiblePoints = F,
  NoGradebookOverride = F,
  NoGradebookOrAdminOverride = F,
  PercentAdjustment = F,
  PercentAdjustmentComment = F,
  StartingPercent = F,
  IsAdminOverride = F,
  IsTransferBucket = F,
  DoNotPost = F,
  IsComplete = F,
  HasUnscoredRequiredFeederBucket = F,
  OverrideComment = F,
  StudentCommentBucketCount = F,
  StudentFreeFormCommentBucketCount = F,
  ClosedGradingPeriodGradeChangeStatus = F,
  CalculatedClosedGradingPeriodGradeChangeStatus = F,
  CalculatedClosedGradingPeriodGradeChangeStatusCode = F,
  CalculatedCalculationTypeCode = F,
  GradingPeriodEndDateHasPassed = F,
  PercentWithAdjustment = F,
  PercentWithAdjustmentNoCap = F,
  GradeMarkToUse = F,
  GradeMarkIDToApply = F,
  GradeMarkToUseIgnoreDoNotPost = F,
  ReportCardGradeMarkToUse = F,
  PercentWithAdjustmentWithGradeMarkToUse = F,
  PercentWithAdjustmentWithGradeMarkToUseIgnoreDoNotPost = F,
  PercentWithGradeMarkIgnoreDoNotPost = F,
  PercentWithAdjustmentWithGradeMarkToUseNoCap = F,
  WeightPercentForGradeBucket = F,
  HasAssignments = F,
  AbsentCount = F,
  ExcusedCount = F,
  UnexcusedCount = F,
  TardyCount = F,
  OtherCount = F,
  HasStudentSectionGradingScaleGradeBucket = F,
  HasStudentSectionLinkConflict = F,
  StudentGradeBucketStatus = F,
  UserIDCreatedBy = F,
  CreatedTime = F,
  UserIDModifiedBy = F,
  ModifiedTime = F,
  GradeMarkIDOutOfDistrictTransferWithdraw = F,
  HasSubjectGrades = F,
  HasAcademicStandardGrades = F,
  PercentWithAdjustmentIgnoreMinimum = F,
  GradeMarkIDToUseIgnoreDoNotPost = F,
  CalculatedPoints = F,
  IsUsingPointsBasedScale = F,
  StudentGradeBucketFlag = F,
  GradeMarkIDToUse = F,
  PercentHasChangedWithinSpecifiedAmountOfTime = F,
  UseCompletionDateOverride = F,
  CompletionDateOverride = F,
  CompletionDate = F,
  IsUnused = F,
  HasGrade = F,
  IsWeightedOnByEnrolledInBucket = F,
  fieldPaths = NULL,
  entityId = 1,
  query = NULL,
  flatten = T,
  returnResponse = F
)

Arguments

StudentGradeBucketID

The ID of the StudentGradeBucket to return.
fieldPaths

Fields from other objects with 'Many to One' or 'One to One' relationships to the given object listed as text. Run getSchemaForObjects('StudentGradeBucket') to get more field paths.
entityId

The id of the entity (school). Run listEntities for a list of entities. Defaults to 1 (district).
flatten

Whether to flatten result into a dataframe or return the json object. Default is TRUE (flatten to dataframe).
returnResponse

Whether to return the server response instead of the results. Useful for debugging. Default is FALSE.
fieldNames

A TRUE or FALSE value determining whether or not to return the field for the given StudentGradeBucket. Defaults to FALSE for all return fields which, for convenience, returns all fields for the StudentGradeBucket.

Value

A dataframe or of StudentGradeBucket Skyward's Knowledge Hub

  • Arguments
  • Value
